channel.title: Learning on Creating Value from Surprise, in a Post Bitcoin World.
channel.description: Recent content in Learning on Creating Value from Surprise, in a Post Bitcoin World.

item.title: Reading/Learning
item.description: I recently read The 21st Century Case For Gold: A New Information Theory Of Money by George Gilder and The DAO of Capital: Austrian Investing in a Distorted World by Mark Spitznagel, and I am currently reading Cents and Sensibility. I am also slowly but surely reading Finnegan’s Wake by James Joyce and The Brothers Karamazov by Fyodor Dostoyevsky. 140 instagram 21.co
